x.Preference.a:summary: Icon space is reserved by default even without an icon

x.Preference.a:title: Icon Space Reserved, No Icon
x.Preference.a:summary: Explicitly reserves icon space but displays no icon

x.Preference.a:title: With Icon
x.Preference.a:summary: This preference has an icon displayed

x.Preference.a:title: No Icon Space Reserved
x.Preference.a:summary: Icon space is not reserved, text uses full width

x.Preference.a:title: Icon with Multi-line Summary
x.Preference.a:summary: This preference has an icon and a multi-line summary. This demonstrates how icons work with longer text that wraps to multiple lines in the summary area.

x.Preference.a:title: No Icon Space, Multi-line
x.Preference.a:summary: No icon space reserved with multi-line summary. This demonstrates full width text usage when icon space is not reserved, allowing more content to be displayed.
